transcript:
you want to know why so many
relationships fail if you are lonely
another person will not solve your
loneliness the problem is not that
you're alone the problem is that you
don't feel whole and complete within
yourself first this is why so many
relationships fail because people want
someone to fill the void that they feel
in themselves if you get into a
relationship with someone for that
reason you didn't solve your inner
problem you just involved an innocent
person in your inner problem you are
looking for an external solution to an
internal problem your relationship will
have problems because your problems are
what caused you to seek that
relationship a good relationship doesn't
start from needing someone to make you
feel less lonely or to make you happy
and a good relationship doesn't start
with finding your other half it starts
with being whole and bringing that whole
version of yourself to the relationship
that is how a relationship succeeds
